entries.name: index_advisor
entries.description: Suggest indexes by pairing HypoPG simulations with cost heuristics.

notes: NOT in PGDG or Pigsty (Supabase-specific extension)
Source build required

entries.name: pg_hashids
entries.description: Encode integers into short hashids for obfuscated identifiers.

notes: NOT in PGDG. Pigsty has v1.2.1 only (no PG18 packages)
Using v1.3 from master (unreleased, no git tag)
Source build required

entries.name: pg_net
entries.description: Async HTTP/HTTPS requests from PostgreSQL for webhooks and API calls.

notes: NOT in PGDG (Supabase-specific). Source build required.
Requires shared_preload_libraries for background worker
Powers async HTTP webhooks from triggers
Use net.http_post() for outbound API calls
Required for pgflow workflow orchestration

entries.name: pg_plan_filter
entries.description: Block high-cost plans or disallowed operations using planner hooks.
entries.disabledReason: Not compatible with PostgreSQL 18. Last updated for PG13 (2021). Maintainer inactive. Enable when updated upstream.

notes: NOT in PGDG. Source build required.

entries.name: pg_safeupdate
entries.description: Guards UPDATE/DELETE without WHERE clause or LIMIT.

notes: NOT in PGDG. Alt: Pigsty v1.5 (same version)
Requires shared_preload_libraries to intercept UPDATE/DELETE queries.

entries.name: pgmq
entries.description: Lightweight message queue for Postgres leveraging LISTEN/NOTIFY.

notes: NOT in PGDG. Alt: Pigsty v1.5.1 (3 minor versions behind)
Source build for latest v1.8.0 with PG18 support

entries.name: pgq
entries.description: Generic high-performance lockless queue with simple SQL function API (supports PostgreSQL 10-18).
entries.disabledReason: Disabled by default to reduce image size and build time (~2-3 minutes). Enable if queue functionality needed.

notes: NOT in PGDG. Alt: Pigsty v3.5.1 (same version)
Pure PLpgSQL extension with no external dependencies
Installs into pg_catalog schema (non-relocatable)

entries.name: pgroonga
entries.description: Full-text search powered by Groonga for multilingual workloads.
notes: NOT available in PGDG for PostgreSQL 18
v4.0.5: Fix LIKE/ILIKE with OR clause returning no results (GH-916)
Source build required for PG18

entries.name: pgsodium
entries.description: Modern cryptography and envelope encryption with libsodium.

notes: NOT in PGDG. Alt: Pigsty v3.1.9 (same version)
Preloaded by default for pgflow and supabase_vault support
Preloading required for event triggers to work (registers pgsodium.enable_event_trigger GUC)
Full Transparent Column Encryption (TCE) requires pgsodium_getkey script
Basic cryptography functions work without getkey script

entries.name: supabase_vault
entries.description: Supabase secret store for encrypted application credentials.

notes: NOT in PGDG (Supabase-specific). Alt: Pigsty v0.3.1 (same version)
Source build required
Required for pgflow workflow orchestration

entries.name: supautils
entries.description: Shared superuser guards and hooks for managed Postgres environments.

notes: v3.0.6: PG18 fixed upstream (str_tolower migration in v2.10.0)
Creates supabase-managed roles which expect pg_cron and pg_net to be present.
